attributes.action: make drivers be re-tested at the ages of 30 and 50.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young drivers are not only to blame. Making people re-take their theory and practical tests acts as a refresher and will improve driving skills.If they do not pass within 2 years of the day they turn that age then the license should be taken away as they are not fit to drive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
